content: Newbies with less than 100 forum activities aren't allowed to participate in campaign.   INTRODUCTION:Heptagon Metavers is the world's first sports metaverse that focuses on transferring the world of sports to METAVERSE. Heptagon Metaverse creates new opportunities for all components of the sports world with the ecosystem built by reinterpreting the sports economy in Metaverse. Heptagon Metaverse is the world's largest stadium, bringing together all sports enthusiasts in the world under a roof, with its structure that makes limited opportunities limitless! Exclusive Features of Heptagon Metaverse  ✅In the Stadiums built in the Heptagon Metaverse, sports enthusiasts have the opportunity to watch live broadcasts recorded with 360XR cameras from wherever they want, with XR glasses/helmets, as if they were in the stadium. ✅Heptagon Metaverse builds a new Virtual Sports universe where sports fans from all over the world and of all ages can participate in the "Virtual World Championships", which will be held for the first time in the world, with their unique and developable Avatars. ✅Heptagon Metaverse creates an innovative opportunity for users to mint NFTs, to build their NFT markets where they can sell the NFTs they minted, and to sell the NFTs they minted with the Tokens they'll be able to produce themselves. ✅With the collaboration of the unique structure of EraChain, which uses the PoW algorithm using an Ethereum Virtual Machine, Heptagon Metaverse builds bridges for users to access Metaverse areas created on different networks and provides its Token by swapping it through contracts which would write for different networks to make it useable on Metaverse areas built in different networks.  Heptagon Ecosystem:   Hepta Token: The Heptagon Ecosystem is built on Hepta Token, which is produced with a fixed supply of 360 million. Users use Hepta Tokens for all transactions such as Live stream tickets, participation fees for virtual championships, NFT minting and sales, and Avatar improvements. Hepta is the key to all of the ecosystem.   ✅Live broadcast revenues, Advertising revenues, Sponsorship agreements revenues, NFT&AVATAR market transaction fees, Virtual championship participation fees, and Virtual store shopping transaction commissions are the basic income of the ecosystem.  Bounty Details★ Heptagon Metaverse bounty campaign will last for 5 weeks and managed by Brainboss Management Service.★ By joining this campaign, all participants accept that their works can be used by the team as promotional materials.★ All participants must join/follow the OFFICIAL SOCIAL ACCOUNTS above to get accepted.★ Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently.★ Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.★ Newbies are welcomed to participate in this campaign although accounts created after the thread was published or have less than 100 activity will be disqualified from participating.★ All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.★ All reports (Twitter, etc) should be sent at the end of week on this thread, use reporting format on spreedsheet to submit reports. No quoting of your previous reports, stakes are updated weekly.★ Team reserves the right to make any changes or end the campaign at any time.Proof of AuthenticationFormat:#Proof Of RegistrationForum Username: Forum Profile Link: Telegram Username: Participated Campaigns:http://Exchange.bytedex.io Exchange ID: Bounty AllocationTotal Budget : $7000 worth HeptaNote: $Hepta tokens will be sent within couple of months after the campaign ends by Heptagon Metaverse Team to your http://Exchange.bytedex.io ID therefore open an account to get your token.. ★ Twitter Campaign:       50%★ Telegram: Campaign:  15%★ Discord Campaign:      15%★ Video Campaign (TikTok/YouTube): 15%★ Article Campaign:         5% Twitter CampaignRewards: maximum 500 participantsRegistration Link: https://forms.gle/exxvemUwcP3gJ4gi8  5 Valid Tweets,  5- Quote Retweets & 5- likes  each.   -   5 Stakes/week10  Valid Tweets, 10- Quote Retweets & 10- likes  each    - 10 Stakes/week   15 Valid Tweets, 15- Quote Retweets & 15- likes  each - 15 Stakes/week20 Valid Tweets, 20- Quote Retweets & 20- likes  each -  20 Stakes/week★ All participants must follow the Official Twitter account of Heptagon Metaverse .★ Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 1k followers and be original (90% in twitter audit for the last 1 month).★ Tweets should be original with hashtags and also Quote retweets must have the following hashtags and links: #metaverse $Hepta #Hepta #vr #vrsport  #VRChat #META #NFTProjectTelegram: https://t.me/HeptagonGlobalNote: All tasks should be done with a minimum of 5 days, using 1-4 days to complete tasks will result to no stakes for the week. Videos need to be a Minimum of 2 minutes long and minimum of 100 views to be eligible.         ★. Each participant can send maximum of 1 video.               ★ Only original video contents (reviews) will be accepted, the reading from the website or using of bots is prohibited. Video contents should focus on the project, reviews, how to use the platform etc are welcomed, no bounty related video, avoid just scrolling/reading through social medias or website.       ★ Videos should never be removed, English only, removal/deletion will result in disqualification.         ★ All videos need to have a link to your Proof of Authentication, project's websites and other social media channel, this will be verified!         ★. By joining this campaign, all participants accept that the project's team can use all their videos as promotional materials.Note: After registration, make sure to check the spreadsheet to confirm that you have been accepted before you start promotion. I am not responsible for you providing me any wrong information.
